text: Bradley Raymond is an American film director. He has directed different movies including Pocahontas II: Journey to a New World, The Lion King 1½ and Tinker Bell. == Filmography == ===Storyboard=== * Thumbelina (1994) * A Troll in Central Park (1994) ===Animators=== * Cats Don't Dance (1997) ===Directors=== * Pocahontas II: Journey to a New World (1998) * Mickey's Once Upon a Christmas (1999) (segment "Donald Duck: Stuck on Christmas") * The Hunchback of Notre Dame II (2002) * The Lion King 1½ (2004) * Tinker Bell (2008) * Tinker Bell and the Great Fairy Rescue (2010) * Pixie Hollow Games (2011) (TV movie) == Other websites == * Category:Living people Category:American movie directors Category:1960 births Category:American animators
title: Bradley Raymond
